msg.msgText: No protocol handler found on connection: Protocol={4} From={0}:{1} Server={2}:{3}.

msgExplanation.p: A connection was attempted using a protocol that is not supported by the Message Gateway server. This error often indicates that a client other than a Message Gateway client is configured to connect to a Message Gateway server.

msgUserResponse.p: Ensure that the client attempting to connect to the Message Gateway server is correctly configured.
